name: Flow (itch) (a.deuerling)
description:
supported Platform: Windows PC

Use the attributes and behaviors of water to your advantage and help Prof. Emils to catch the escaped entities.

Flow is a short and simple puzzle-platformer centered around a water gun. It was created within the context of a university module and whether I will continue this project is not sure yet.

To start the game:

  1. download files
  2. unzip files
  3. open the folder and double click on the application "Flow"
